<body bgcolor="#FFF0F0" background="publication_files/image001.gif" lang=EN-US
link="#009999" vlink="#666699" style='tab-interval:.5in' alink="#0000FF">
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <v:background id="_x0000_s1025" o:bwmode="white" fillcolor="#fff0f0"
  o:targetscreensize="1024,768">
  <v:fill src="publication_files/image001.gif" o:title="netbkgnd" type="frame"/>
 </v:background></xml><![endif]-->

<div class=WordSection1>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Journal Publications<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>3. <span class=SpellE>ReCrew</span>: A Reliable
Flash-Dissemination System (Accepted for publication in IEEE Transactions on
Computers, 2012)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Kyungbaek</span> Kim, <span class=SpellE>Mayur</span>
<span class=SpellE>Deshpande</span>, <span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span
class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>,
<span class=SpellE>Nalini</span> <span class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>. <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:red'>NEW!</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>2. Secure Multidimensional Range Queries over Outsourced
Data (accepted for publication in VLDBJ, 2011)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>,
Mustafa <span class=SpellE>Canim</span>, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span
class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>, Murat <span class=SpellE>Kantarcioglu</span>. <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p> </o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>1. CCD: A Distributed Publish/Subscribe Framework for Rich
Content Formats (accepted for publication in IEEE TPDS, 2011)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Hojjat</span> <span class=SpellE>Jafarpour</span>,
<span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Nalini</span> <span class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>.<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p> </o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Conference
Publications<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>16. <span class=SpellE>CloudProtect</span>: Managing Data
Privacy in Cloud Applications (accepted for publication in IEEE CLOUD, 2012)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Mamadou</span> H. <span class=SpellE>Diallo</span>,
<span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Ee-Chien</span> Chang, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span
class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>, <span class=SpellE>Nalini</span> <span
class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='color:red'>NEW!</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>15. Risk-Aware Workload Distribution in Hybrid Clouds
(accepted for publication in IEEE CLOUD, 2012)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Kerim</span> <span class=SpellE>Yasin</span>
<span class=SpellE>Oktay</span>, <span class=SpellE>Vaibhav</span> <span
class=SpellE>Khadilkar</span>, <span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span
class=SpellE>Hore</span>, Murat <span class=SpellE>Kantarcioglu</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Bhavani</span> <span class=SpellE>Thurasingham</span>. <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:red'>NEW!</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>14. Building Disclosure Risk Aware Query Optimizers for
Relational Databases (VLDB 2010, Singapore) [<a href="papers/vldb10.pdf">PDF</a>]</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Mustafa <span class=SpellE>Canim</span>, Murat <span
class=SpellE>Kantarcioglu</span>, <span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span
class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>.<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:red'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>13. Middleware for Pervasive Spaces: Balancing Privacy and
Utility (MIDDLEWARE 2009, Urbana Champaign, USA) [<a
href="papers/middleware-privacy-utility.pdf">PDF</a>] </p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Daniel <span class=SpellE>Massaguer</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span class=SpellE>Mamadou</span>
H. <span class=SpellE>Diallo</span>, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span
class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>, <span class=SpellE>Nalini</span> <span
class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>12. CCD: Efficient Customized Content Dissemination in
Distributed Publish/Subscribe (MIDDLEWARE 2009, Urbana Champaign, USA) [<a
href="papers/customized-content-dissemination.pdf">PDF</a>]</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Hojjat</span> <span class=SpellE>Jafarpour</span>,
<span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Nalini</span> <span class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>11. Privacy-Preserving Event Detection for Pervasive Spaces
(PERCOM 2009, Galveston, USA) [<a href="papers/pped_percom09.pdf">PDF</a>] [<a
href="papers/pped_extended_version.pdf">long version</a>]</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>,
<span class=SpellE>Jehan</span> <span class=SpellE>Wickramasuriya</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Nalini</span> <span class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>, Daniel
<span class=SpellE>Massaguer</span>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>10. Subscription <span class=SpellE>Subsumption</span>
Evaluation for Content-based Publish/Subscribe Systems (MIDDLEWARE 2008,
Leuven, Belgium) [<a href="papers/subscription-subsumption-evaluation(MW08).pdf"><span
style='color:black;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none'>PDF</span></a><span
class=GramE>][</span><a href="papers/MW2008_Slides.ppt"><span style='color:
black;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none'>ppt</span></a>]<span
class=MsoHyperlink><span style='color:black;text-decoration:none;text-underline:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Hojjat</span> <span class=SpellE>Jafarpour</span>,
<span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Nalini</span> <span class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>9. Discovering GIS Sources on the Web using Summaries, (JCDL
2008, Pittsburg, USA) [<a href="papers/gis-summarization.pdf"><span
style='color:black;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none'>PDF</span></a>]<span
class=MsoHyperlink><span style='color:black;text-decoration:none;text-underline:
none'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Ramaswamy</span> <span class=SpellE>Hariharan</span>,
<span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>8. Exploiting Semantics for Sensor Re-Calibration in Event
Detection Systems, (MMCN 2008, San Jose, USA) [<a href="papers/semantics.pdf"><span
style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;text-underline:
none'>PDF</span></a>]<span class=MsoHyperlink><span style='color:black;
text-decoration:none;text-underline:none'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Ronen <span class=SpellE>Vaisenberg</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Shengyue</span> <span class=SpellE>Ji</span>, <span class=SpellE>Bijit</span>
<span class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>7. Flexible Anonymization for Privacy Preserving Data
Publishing: A Systematic Search based Approach, (Siam Data Mining Conference
2007, Minneapolis, USA) [<a href="papers/kanony.pdf"><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none'>PDF</span></a>]
<span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>[<a

none;text-underline:none'>long version</span></a>]</span><span

none'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>,
Ravi <span class=SpellE>Jammalamadaka</span>, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span
class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>.</p>

<p>6. Processing Spatial-Keyword (SK) Queries in Geographical Information
Retrieval (GIR) Systems, (SSDBM 2007, Banff, Canada) [<a
href="papers/ssdbm2007.pdf"><span style='color:black;mso-bidi-font-style:italic;
text-decoration:none;text-underline:none'>PDF</span></a><span class=GramE>]</span><br>
<span class=SpellE>Ramaswamy</span> <span class=SpellE>Hariharan</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>, Chen Li, <span
class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>.</p>

<p>5. Design and Implementation of a Middleware for Sentient Spaces, (ISI 2007,
New Brunswick, USA) [<a href="papers/isi2007.pdf"><span style='color:black;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none'>PDF</span></a>]<br>
<span class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Hojjat</span> <span class=SpellE>Jafarpor</span>, Ramesh Jain,
Daniel <span class=SpellE>Massaguer</span>, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span
class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>, <span class=SpellE>Nalini</span> <span
class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>, <span class=SpellE>Utz</span> <span
class=SpellE>Westermann</span>.<span class=MsoHyperlink><span style='color:
black;mso-bidi-font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p>4. <span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>CREW: A Gossip-based
Flash-Dissemination System, (ICDCS 2006, <span class=SpellE>Lisboa</span>,
Portugal) [<a href="papers/crew_ics_tr_2005.pdf"><span style='color:black;
text-decoration:none;text-underline:none'>PDF</span></a>]<br>
<span class=SpellE>Mayur</span> <span class=SpellE>Deshpande</span>, Bo Xing, <span
class=SpellE>Iosif</span> <span class=SpellE>Lazaridis</span>, <span
class=SpellE>Bijit</span> <span class=SpellE>Hore</span>, <span class=SpellE>Nalini</span>
<span class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>, <span class=SpellE>Sharad</span> <span
class=SpellE>Mehrotra</span>.<span class=MsoHyperlink><span style='color:black;
text-decoration:none;text-underline:none'><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>3. Indexing Text Data under Space
Constraints, (CIKM 2004, Washington D. C., USA) [<a
